title: A disconnect bug I have been experiencing.
body:
1. So in the past couple weeks, I have been experiencing MAJOR issues with connecting to my games. A couple games, I would disconnect and have had to reconnect 14 times in a row (This is not an exaggeration) for it to actually work. 
2. I have had multiple occasions where I would get into the loading screen after everyone has connected, and I would sit there at 50%. 
3. Shortly after, the second bug I experienced would be that I would connect after so many frustrating disconnects, I would get in game. And NOTHING would load other then the map itself. No one would spawn, no character models, just the map.
4. To finish this off I have also had multiple occasions where it would tell me I had no internet and I have had to relaunch the League Client 4 times before I actually connect to the game. 

If this was my fault and I somehow did something wrong I would love to know.

replies.body: This sounds really awful, I'm sorry.  :(  Your connection, at least to League, is super degraded and I recommend troubleshooting in custom games for now.  Your best bet would to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help improve the health of your connection and rule out possibilities.  Let me know if it helps.
